Portsmouth Cycle Forum

Portsmouth Cycle Forum is a group for anyone who cycles, or wants to cycle, in and around Portsmouth UK.

Rides

Family Bike Ride to Gosport & Stokes Bay

Monday 21 June 2010
1 min

Portsmouth Cycle Forum Presents a Family Bike Ride to Gosport & Stokes Bay

Saturday 26 June 09.30 – 13.00

**Meeting Points **

  • 09.00 The Hard Interchange (by Gosport Ferry pontoon).

  • 10.00 Ferry Gardens, Gosport The Route 

  • Circular route using cycle lanes and quiet roads to the seaside at Stokes Bay. Return to the ferry via Alverstoke. Distance 

  • Approximately 12 miles. All Welcome!

This is a Bike Week 2010 event.

Download a poster.
